text: aur samood[1] kee or unake bhaee saalehî€¼ ko bheja. usane kahaah he meree jaati ke logo! allaah kee ibaadat (vandana) karo, usake siva tumhaara koee poojy nahin hai. useene tumhen dharatee se utpann kiya aur tumhen usamen basa diya, atah usase kshama maango aur usee kee or dhyaanamagn ho jao. vaastav mein, mera paalanahaar sameep hai ( aur duaayen) sveekaar karane vaala hai
